entry.tran: 公正的;无偏见的;公允的
entry.def: A fair-minded person always tries to be fair and reasonable, and always listens to other people's opinions.

example.ex: She is one of the most fair-minded people I know.

means.word_mean: 1. of a person; just and impartial; not prejudiced
